welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hanwell, a charming town known for its historical landmarks and picturesque streets. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring our city and all it has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The primary terminal at Northolt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Northolt Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the busiest terminals at Heathrow, serving a mix of international and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and Oneworld alliance flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and duty-free shopping.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Gatwick Airport, mainly serving European and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is a smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
